abstract: fy2018 eps estimates for asure software inc increased by analyst .
article: asure software inc -- equities researchers at dougherty & co increased their fy2018 earnings estimates for asure software in a research report issued to clients and investors on thursday . dougherty & co analyst r. mattson now expects that the technology company will post earnings per share of $ 0.72 for the year , up from their previous estimate of $ 0.64 . dougherty & co currently has a `` buy '' rating and a $ 18.00 target price on the stock . a number of other research analysts have also recently commented on asur . canaccord genuity reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 18.00 price target on shares of asure software in a report on tuesday , october 17th .

cowen boosted their price target on asure software from $ 17.00 to $ 20.00 and gave the stock an `` outperform '' rating in a report on tuesday , december 19th . northland securities reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 18.00 price target on shares of asure software in a report on thursday , september 21st . zacks investment research raised asure software from a `` sell '' rating to a `` hold '' rating and set a $ 16.00 price target on the stock in a report on tuesday , january 2nd . finally , craig hallum initiated coverage on asure software in a report on monday , december 4th .

they issued a `` buy '' rating on the stock . two investment analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and eight have issued a buy rating to the company 's stock . asure software currently has a consensus rating of `` buy '' and an average price target of $ 17.50 . asure software traded up $ 0.21 during mid-day trading on monday , hitting $ 14.89 . the stock had a trading volume of 126,200 shares , compared to its average volume of 151,250 . asure software has a 12-month low of $ 9.24 and a 12-month high of $ 17.27 .

the company has a current ratio of 1.39 , a quick ratio of 1.37 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.04 . the stock has a market cap of $ 185.63 , a pe ratio of -39.18 , a p/e/g ratio of 0.76 and a beta of 1.17 . several institutional investors and hedge funds have recently modified their holdings of the company . navellier & associates inc raised its holdings in shares of asure software by 13.1 % during the 2nd quarter . navellier & associates inc now owns 49,953 shares of the technology company 's stock worth $ 730,000 after acquiring an additional 5,775 shares in the last quarter .
